Release notes

Friday May 1, 2020

Yay! Welcome to V1.0 of my new website. I am still figuring stuff out. This is the first of many improvements to my website.

  • Switched from plain HTML to Jekyll ↗
  • Switched from TransIP hosting ↗ to GitHub Pages ↗
  • Rewrote the content on Home
  • Added a blog overview called Posts
  • Rewrote A Year In Review in markdown
  • Added a 404 page
  • Added these release notes

Behind the scenes

  • Concerning project management, I am now keeping track of my tasks in Jira ↗
  • I will start writing drafts in Jekyll ↗ instead of Google Drive ↗
